author: Sydnee Batzlaff
title: ‚ÄòWe‚Äôre teared out‚Äô: School district mourns the loss of principal killed in crash after basketball game
text:
DALHART, Texas (KFDA/Gray News) - One Texas community is mourning the loss of their high school principal after he was killed in a crash after a basketball game.
Scot Wright, who was the principal at Dalhart High School, was returning home from the basketball game Tuesday night when he was involved in a head-on collision with a semi around 1 a.m.
KFDA reports Wright later died at the hospital.
Jeff Byrd, the school district‚Äôs superintendent, said Wright was loved by many in the community and he leaves a lasting impact.
‚ÄúHe was just a great man and a great friend and we‚Äôre sad, we‚Äôre teared out, but he was a great man and we love him. We‚Äôre gonna miss him,‚Äù Byrd said.
Byrd said he sees the glass as half full despite the tragedy and he encourages the community to celebrate the positive impact Wright had at Dalhart High School.
‚ÄúI can assure you, in the six years that Scot Wright was the principal here, he touched and changed many lives and set examples for our students they‚Äôll carry with them throughout their lives,‚Äù Byrd said.
The City of Dalhart is no stranger to tragedy, as it has lost several students as well as its fire chief and a firefighter over the last few years, according to KFDA.
‚ÄúWe have met our quota, we obviously don‚Äôt want to deal with this anymore. But at the end of the day we‚Äôre firm believers in God‚Äôs plan and this was part of God‚Äôs plan and God‚Äôs never gonna give us more than we‚Äôre capable of handling,‚Äù Byrd said.
Wright is survived by his wife Torri, who serves as a school nurse for the district, and his two children.
The school district plans to coordinate with students on how to celebrate Wright‚Äôs life.
Copyright 2024 KFDA via Gray Media Group, Inc. All rights reserved.

author: Armando Hern√°ndez
title: Peligrosas olas golpean las costas de California y se convierten en amenaza para los turistas
text:
Peligrosas olas golpean las costas de California y se convierten en amenaza para los turistas
Mientras al norte existe el riesgo de olas superiores a los 30 pies, todas las playas de Los √Ångeles tambi√©n han sido sometidas a un aviso de alto oleaje e inundaciones costeras
El Servicio Meteorol√≥gico Nacional dio a conocer el pron√≥stico de grandes olas en las costas de California el jueves, lo que podr√≠an representar una amenaza para los visitantes, justo el fin de semana cuando se celebra el A√±o Nuevo.
Una intensa marejada cicl√≥nica azot√≥ la costa del norte de California el jueves y se espera que se extienda por todo el estado.
Ante la situaci√≥n, se han ordenado evacuaciones en todo el norte de California, espec√≠ficamente en el √Årea de la Bah√≠a, mientras el oleaje peligrosamente alto y las marejadas cicl√≥nicas golpean las costas con olas que se espera que alcancen una altura de 33 pies.
Se inst√≥ a los residentes a ‚Äúirse inmediatamente‚Äù, ya que olas masivas tambi√©n sacudieron el jueves el √°rea de Stinson Beach, ubicada en el condado de Marin.
El Servicio Meteorol√≥gico Nacional ha emitido una advertencia de oleaje alto que estar√° vigente hasta las 3 a. m. del viernes. Se pronostica que las olas alcanzar√°n entre 28 y 33 pies de altura en las playas orientadas al oeste.
Tambi√©n advirtieron a los residentes que estas condiciones ponen en peligro la vida y que deben ‚Äúmantenerse alejados del agua‚Äù, junto con embarcaderos y rocas.
Adem√°s, aconsejaron a las personas que se aseguraran de no dar la espalda al agua, ya que es probable que haya olas mucho m√°s grandes que pueden correr muy lejos en la arena y arrastrar a alguien de la playa.
Seg√∫n el anuncio oficial, al sur, algunas √°reas locales podr√≠an ver olas de hasta 15 pies de altura. Se espera que la costa del condado de Ventura y las playas de Hermosa, Manhattan y Palos Verdes experimenten los impactos m√°s significativos.
Pese a que se trata de un fen√≥meno que favorece a quien practique surf, representa un gran riesgo para los visitantes, quienes acuden justo d√≠as previos a la celebraci√≥n del A√±o Nuevo.el aviso de oleaje alto entr√≥ en vigor a las 4 am del jueves y durar√° hasta las 10 pm del s√°bado.
El jueves en Ventura, grandes olas rompieron un muro de contenci√≥n en la playa y los socorristas se mantuvieron ocupados rescatando a los espectadores que se acercaban demasiado al fuerte oleaje.
Varios autos fueron vistos atrapados en una calle inundada cerca de la playa en el √°rea de Seaward y Zephyr. Los socorristas advirtieron a las personas que se hab√≠an reunido para observar las grandes olas que deb√≠an alejarse m√°s del agua.
En Oxnard, las calles cercanas a la playa se inundaron de manera similar y varios autom√≥viles tambi√©n quedaron atrapados.
Las autoridades dicen que es posible que se produzcan inundaciones en algunas zonas bajas. En Newport Beach, se advirti√≥ a los residentes sobre las condiciones y se repusieron los diques de arena.
Los funcionarios de la ciudad dijeron que equipos monitorear√≠an los niveles de agua y bombear√≠an agua si fuera necesario. Mientras tanto, se insta a los ba√±istas del condado de Los √Ångeles a hablar con los salvavidas antes de meterse al agua.
Se espera que el aumento sea causado por dos sistemas de tormentas separados. Uno est√° dirigido al norte de California, mientras que el otro afectar√° a todo el Estado con lluvias masivas.
Sigue leyendo:
‚Äì
Excursionista sobrevive a una ca√≠da de casi 1,000 pies desde una ruta de senderismo en Hawaii
‚Äì
Excursionista qued√≥ atrapado bajo una roca de las monta√±as de California durante 7 horas
‚Äì
Un hombre muri√≥ tras caer escalando hielo en el Bosque Nacional Custer Gallatin

author: Demetris Afxentiou
title: TFSA: How to Invest for $250 Monthly in Retirement
text: Finding that perfect mix of investments today can help to establish a viable and growing income stream for retirement. Even better, starting early can help grow that income stream to invest $250 or more in monthly income. Let‚Äôs look at a few options to invest in right now. Forget the landlord-tenant thing Buying a rental property is one of the tried-and-true means of establishing a recurring income stream. Unfortunately, interest rates and home prices rising well into the stratosphere have priced would-be landlords out of the market. This is where the appeal of RioCan Real Estate ( [TSX:REI.UN](https://www.fool.ca/company/tsx-rei-un-riocan-real-estate-investment-trust/368711/)) comes into play. RioCan is one of the largest REITs in Canada. Historically, RioCan has focused on commercial retail properties, such as large anchor tenants in malls. In recent years, that property mix has shifted to include a growing number of mixed-use residential properties. RioCan refers to these unique properties as RioCan Living. And here is where a huge opportunity lies to invest $250 or more each month. The mixed-use properties comprise several floors of retail and then residential towers above them. The properties are situated along high-traffic, in-demand areas of Canada‚Äôs major metro areas. In terms of income, RioCan provides investors with a juicy monthly distribution, much like a landlord collecting rent. As of the time of writing, the yield offered works out to a respectable 5.88%, making it one of the better-paying options on the market. Prospective investors should also note that an investment in RioCan will be significantly lower than the downpayment on a rental property. That investment also does not come with a mortgage, maintenance, property taxes, or tenant fees. In other words, RioCan is a great option to invest $250 or more right now. Monthly income with a diversified pick An often-dismissed great option for investors looking to invest for $250 in monthly income is Exchange Income Corporation ( [TSX:EIF](https://www.fool.ca/company/tsx-eif-exchange-income-corporation/346080/)). For those unfamiliar with the stock, Exchange owns over a dozen subsidiary companies that broadly fall under aviation and manufacturing groups. This makes it a [well-diversified](https://www.fool.ca/investing/portfolio-diversification/) option to consider, but that‚Äôs not all. What‚Äôs interesting about those subsidiaries is that they all generate cash for Exchange, and more importantly, serve unique segments of the market. In short, they all provide a necessity where there is limited if any competition. In other words, Exchange provides significant defensive appeal, too. By way of example, on the aviation side of the operation, Exchange‚Äôs subsidiaries offer passenger and cargo service to remote regions of Canada‚Äôs north. On the manufacturing side, businesses include niche operations such as cell tower services and fabrication services. Those unique subsidiaries generate cash for Exchange, which in turn provides investors with a juicy income stream. As of the time of writing, the yield on Exchange‚Äôs dividend works out to an impressive 5.86%. This means that investors with $30,000 allocated towards exchange can expect a [monthly income](https://www.fool.ca/investing/top-canadian-monthly-dividend-stocks/) of $146. Oh, and prospective investors can take solace knowing that Exchange has provided investors with annual upticks to that dividend 17 times in the past 19 years. Final thoughts All stocks, even the most defensive carry some risk. Fortunately, the stocks mentioned above provide some defensive appeal in addition to a juicy income. Speaking of income, prospective investors can scoop up a handsome monthly income. Here‚Äôs how to invest for $250 in income (or more in this case!) |Company||Recent Price||No. of Shares||Dividend||Total Payout||Frequency| |Exchange Income Corporation||$45.04||666||$2.64||$146.52||Monthly| |RioCan Real Estate||$18.38||1632||$1.08||$146.88||Monthly|

author: Logan Fairbrother
title: Nike LeBron TR1 Release Date | Hypebeast
text:
As LeBron James gears up to enter his 22nd year in the NBA, he‚Äôs set to release his 22nd entry in his Nike LeBron line of signature shoes. While he‚Äôs offered basketball models outside of his main franchise, often positioned as budget options, he‚Äôs expanding his partnership with Nike in a new direction with his first training shoe ‚Äî the Nike LeBron TR1 (Trainer 1).
Rumored towards the end of last year, the shoe was first spotted during James‚Äô historic run at this year‚Äôs Olympic Games. Now, following a set of official imagery of the new trainer, the Swoosh has officially announced the sneaker. The TR1 sports what is described as an ‚Äúergonomic and lightweight design‚Äù ‚Äî one that sees the typical strobel unit removed in favor of athletes coming closer to the foam cushioning while a new inverted waffle outsole backs key movement. Its glove-like bootie combines with a wide last to combat the swelling of feet one often faces while training.
‚ÄúThe TR1 is for the athlete who‚Äôs in constant pursuit of greatness and puts in the work, day in and day out,‚Äù says James. ‚ÄúTraining is a huge part of my journey, and this shoe is designed for athletes to use during any workout, any time, any place.‚Äù
The new silhouette will debut in its gray and neon green ‚ÄúDunk Man‚Äù colorway on September 19 via Nike SNKRS and select retailers at a starting price of $130 USD. From there, a ‚ÄúZero Dark 30‚Äù look favors a monochromatic flavor that will arrive on October 10. The ‚ÄúPurple Rain‚Äù pair will drop on October 23, the day after the NBA resumes play for the 2024-25 season. Lastly, an orange ‚ÄúBetter With Age‚Äù-themed take on the shoe is due to hit shelves on November 11. Read Full Article

author: MENAFN
title: Pole to Pole electric vehicle expedition reaches the South Pole | MENAFN.COM
text:
( MENAFN - Edelman) YOKOHAMA, Japan (December 28, 2023) - Chris and Julie Ramsey, husband and wife adventurers, have completed their all-electric journey to the South Pole in Antarctica.
Their 10-month, 30,000 km adventure that started on the frozen Arctic Sea at the 1823 Magnetic North Pole, has seen them drive the varied terrains and conditions of North, Central and South America before carefully traversing the most remote continent on the planet, to reach the South Pole. This is the first time any car, let alone an EV, has completed such a journey.
Across long distances and challenging off-road terrains, the all-electric expedition vehicle, a Nissan Ariya with e-4ORCE all-wheel control, has passed the toughest tests at extreme temperatures and high altitudes. The vehicle ‚Äì factory-standard with no modifications to the powertrain or battery ‚Äì was modified by polar mobility specialists Arctic Trucks, to accommodate 39-inch BF Goodrich tires.
Chris and Julie began planning Pole to Pole in 2017 after completing the Mongol Rally in their Nissan LEAF, the first time an EV had been used to tackle the 10,000- km challenge. They recognized how much interest this type of epic adventure could generate in electric vehicles, as well as creating a legacy of charging infrastructure behind. They felt Pole to Pole was the ultimate EV adventure and made it a reality through a commitment to collaboration and innovation with like-minded partners.
Chris commented, ‚ÄúI can‚Äôt believe we‚Äôre at the South Pole. After so many years of planning, it doesn‚Äôt feel real. I‚Äôve always had full confidence in the amazing capabilities of electric vehicles, and I knew our Nissan Ariya would tackle everything thrown at it. But it‚Äôs been far tougher than I anticipated. I‚Äôm proud that Pole to Pole has reached millions of people in parts of the world and enthused them about embracing EV in their day to day lives.‚Äù
Julie added, ‚ÄùThis has been an incredible journey, with the people we‚Äôve met, the
friends we‚Äôve made and the support we‚Äôve received. Pole to Pole started out as just Chris and I, but the expedition team is now made of up of thousands of kind, forward-thinking people. These supporters and contributors want to make a difference and share the excitement of electric driving.‚Äù
Allyson Witherspoon, Corporate vice president, Nissan Global Marketing, Brand and Merchandizing, said, ‚ÄùOn behalf of everyone at Nissan, congratulations on completing Pole to Pole. We all admire your daring spirit and passion for pushing the boundaries of electric adventure. It has been an extraordinary journey to follow and a point of pride for us at Nissan. It has shown how Nissan‚Äôs innovative technology continues to deliver excitement, whether on a trip to the office or to the Antarctic!‚Äù
MENAFN28122023003109013449ID1107664752

title: Professores da rede municipal do Rio v\u00e3o continuar em greve
text:
29/11/2024 - 17:36
A greve dos professores da rede municipal do Rio de Janeiro, que come√ßou na segunda-feira (25), vai continuar. A decis√£o foi tomada pela categoria em assembleia realizada nesta sexta-feira (29), na quadra da Escola de Samba S√£o Clemente, na regi√£o central da cidade, para discutir os rumos do movimento.
Segundo a coordenadora geral do Sindicato Estadual dos Profissionais da Educa√ß√£o do Estado do Rio de Janeiro (Sepe-RJ), Helenita Bezerra, que participou da assembleia, a entidade ainda n√£o foi notificada oficialmente da decis√£o do presidente do Tribunal de Justi√ßa do Estado do Rio de Janeiro (TJRJ), desembargador Ricardo Rodrigues Cardoso, que determinou ontem (28) a imediata interrup√ß√£o da greve dos professores da rede municipal e o retorno ao trabalho.
Al√©m disso, o desembargador estipulou multa de R$ 500 mil √† entidade da categoria e de R$ 5 mil aos diretores do sindicato em cada dia de descumprimento da ordem.
Not√≠cias relacionadas:
[Justi√ßa suspende greve e professores do Rio fazem assembleia .](https://agenciabrasil.ebc.com.br/justica/noticia/2024-11/justica-suspende-greve-e-professores-do-rio-fazem-assembleia)[Um em cada 3 professores de escolas p√∫blicas n√£o tem forma√ß√£o adequada.](https://agenciabrasil.ebc.com.br/educacao/noticia/2024-11/um-em-cada-3-professores-de-escolas-publicas-nao-tem-formacao-adequada)[Sindicatos: decis√£o comprova que reforma trabalhista retirou direitos.](https://agenciabrasil.ebc.com.br/justica/noticia/2024-11/sindicatos-decisao-comprova-que-reforma-trabalhista-retirou-direitos)
‚ÄúA assembleia deliberou pela continuidade da greve, e o sindicato ainda n√£o tem notifica√ß√£o oficial de ilegalidade da greve. Enquanto n√£o tem, os nossos advogados n√£o t√™m como se mexer sobre um fato que, para n√≥s, n√£o √© oficial‚Äù, disse Helenita √† Ag√™ncia Brasil.
A decis√£o do juiz atendeu a pedido da prefeitura do Rio, que argumentou ilegalidade da paralisa√ß√£o por meio de a√ß√£o de diss√≠dio coletivo de greve. ‚ÄúO munic√≠pio informou que n√£o houve aviso pr√©vio em rela√ß√£o ao movimento grevista e nem tentativa de di√°logo entre a categoria e a Secretaria Municipal de Educa√ß√£o‚Äù, relatou o TJRJ.
De acordo com o presidente do tribunal, o sindicato n√£o cumpriu ‚Äúelementos b√°sicos para garantir a legalidade da greve‚Äù, como o esgotamento da tentativa de di√°logo e a notifica√ß√£o pr√©via m√≠nima de 48 horas. ‚ÄúEm uma primeira an√°lise, n√£o h√° comprova√ß√£o do esgotamento da via negocial e da sua frustra√ß√£o. Pelo contr√°rio, o documento ID. 01, do Anexo 1, demonstra que, no mesmo dia em que houve a convoca√ß√£o da assembleia pelo sindicato, deliberou-se pelo in√≠cio imediato e sem termo final do movimento paredista‚Äù, disse o desembargador.
‚ÄúN√£o h√° d√∫vida de que as atividades dos servidores da educa√ß√£o s√£o essenciais‚Äù, afirmou Ricardo Cardoso, ressaltando que este √© um fator de limite para o exerc√≠cio do direito de greve. O desembargador determinou que a prefeitura desconte o sal√°rio proporcionalmente aos dias de paralisa√ß√£o ilegal.
Na tentativa de acordo, foi marcada uma audi√™ncia virtual para o dia 11 de dezembro, √†s 15h. ‚ÄúO sindicato da categoria reivindica o arquivamento do Projeto de Lei (PL) 186/2024, que amplia a quantidade de aulas para os professores e traz altera√ß√µes em direitos como f√©rias e licen√ßas. Professores e funcion√°rios das escolas do munic√≠pio tamb√©m exigem a revoga√ß√£o da Lei 8666/2024, que aumenta para at√© seis anos os contratos tempor√°rios na rede‚Äù, completou o TJRJ em nota.
A coordenadora do Sepe-RJ informou ainda que, na quarta-feira (4), haver√° nova assembleia. At√© l√°, a categoria pretende discutir na C√¢mara de Vereadores a apresenta√ß√£o de emendas ao Projeto de Lei 186 ou a retirada deste pelo prefeito Eduardo Paes.
‚ÄúTiramos uma pauta de mobiliza√ß√£o que prev√™ panfletagens, atos e uma s√©rie de coisas para serem feitas com a categoria. Na quarta-feira teremos nova assembleia. Estamos aguardando tamb√©m a casa legislativa nos chamar para mais uma audi√™ncia em que vamos dizer se a categoria concordou, ou n√£o, em colocar emendas ao projeto de lei. Eles [vereadores] v√£o nos dizer, ou n√£o, se o prefeito concordou em retirar o PL 186 de pauta‚Äù, concluiu.
A Secretaria Municipal de Educa√ß√£o informou √† Ag√™ncia Brasil ‚Äúque a rede municipal caminha para o encerramento do ano letivo e seguir√° o planejamento normal do calend√°rio escolar, sem altera√ß√µes‚Äù.
